languages.text: {n}Маражай морщится от ваших слов — но не от гнева, а от разочарования. Кажется, он ожидал не такого ответа.{/n}
{n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай морщится от ваших слов — но не от гнева, а от разочарования. Кажется, он ожидал не такого ответа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai frowns at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tuerce el gesto al oír tus palabras; pero más que enfadado, parece decepcionado. Se ve que esperaba otra respuesta por tu parte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai frunce el ceño al oír tus palabras; pero más que enfadado, parece decepcionado. Se ve que esperaba otra respuesta por tu parte.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到你的话之后，玛拉斋的脸扭曲起来，并非出于愤怒，而是发自失望。看来，他期待的并不是这样的答案。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话之后，玛拉斋皱起了眉，并不是因为愤怒，而是因为失望。看来，他期待的并不是这样的答案。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai grimace, non de colère, mais de déception. Il semblait espérer une autre réponse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fronce les sourcils, non de colère, mais de déception. Il semblait espérer une autre réponse.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたの言葉に顔を歪める…怒りからではなく、失望からだ。彼は違う答えを期待していたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはあなたの言葉に顔を歪める…怒りからではなく、失望からだ。彼は違う答えを期待していたようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai runzelt ob deiner Worte die Stirn. Nicht aus Wut, sondern aus Enttäuschung. Er hatte wohl mit einer anderen Antwort gerechnet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai runzelt ob deiner Worte die Stirn. Nicht aus Wut, sondern aus Enttäuschung. Er hatte wohl mit einer anderen Antwort gerechnet.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzü, sözlerin karşısında öfkeyle olmasa da hayal kırıklığıyla ekşiyor. Farklı bir cevap ummuş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face twists at your words — not from anger, but from disappointment. It seems he expected a different answer.{/n}
